select id, company_id, project_id, year, month, product_value, checked_value, is_checked, cst_create, cst_modified, staff_id, staff_name from business_capacity_item

select a.id, a.company_id, a.project_id, a.year, a.month, a.product_value, a.checked_value, a.is_checked, a.cst_create, a.cst_modified, sum(ifnull(b.checked_value,0))as sum_value, a.staff_id, a.staff_name from business_capacity_item as a left join business_capacity_item as b on (b.year*12+b.month)<=(a.year*12+a.month) and b.is_checked=true and a.project_id=b.project_id where a.project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by a.id order by a.year desc, a.month desc limit #{page.frontIndex},#{page.size}
